message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose an initial offer of $1100000. This price reflects the product's worth while allowing us both to benefit from the transaction. I look forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I need to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I propose an adjusted offer of $1075000 for the product. This price still reflects the value of the product, while being more flexible for your current financial situation. I hope this proposal works for you, and I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to consider $1050000 as a potential price for the product.

I'm glad you found my offer acceptable, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your willingness to pay, I propose a final offer of $1062500. This price is higher than my previous offers and slightly lower than your latest proposal, aiming to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. I am willing to consider $1055000 as a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you the product at a price of $1060000. This price reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair transaction between us. I hope this offer is acceptable and we can finalize the deal.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and staying within my budget, I am willing to pay $1057500 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet you halfway. I propose a final offer of $1058750 for the product. This price is slightly above your last offer and aims to ensure a fair transaction for both parties. I hope this offer is satisfactory and we can conclude our negotiations.
Thank you for your effort, Alice. Considering the value of the product and staying within my budget, I am willing to pay $1057000 for the product.
